# Monument (Building)
## Overview
**Monument**

**Create** 10 Goods, 8 Labor (360 gp)

**Rooms** 1 Furnishings ([[Statue (Room)|Statue]]), 1 [[Statue (Room)|Statue]]

A statue of a famous person, a memorial for fallen warriors, or a public display of art.
